title: Instiinfo
text: It is a IIT Kharagpur based start-up , commonly used by first year students .It helps the students to know about the culture, societies and sports of our campus .Here they provide many things like lecture notes, previous year question papers , e-books . They provides an idea of better food joints , competitions,scholarships and they also give IIT JEE Rank list .

title: History
text:
It is started by IIT Kharagpur students of Azad Hall . Their names are as follows :-
